article_title: Mary Burke releases top six issues on campaign website
article_text:
Madison, WI (53711)

Today

Partly to mostly cloudy with scattered showers and thunderstorms developing this afternoon. High around 80F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%..

Tonight

Thunderstorms early, then cloudy skies after midnight. Low 63F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

article_metadata.author: Jack Craver | The Capital Times

og.description: The Democratic candidate for governor highlights her stances on jobs, education, budgeting, health care, social issues and the environment.
